title: Safe Biking with Dad
description: Dad, Jennie, and Charlie are ready for a bike ride to the park-or are they? Safe Biking with Dad points out bike safety rules in a humorous way. Students have the opportunity to identify cause-and-effect relationships. Detailed, supportive illustrations, high-frequency words, and introductory words support emergent readers.
meta: handlebars, helmets, honked, nervous, pedaled, pothole, protect, signal, swerve
